children.title: baseUri
children.description: A URI that's to be used as the base of all the resources' URIs. Often used as the base of the URL of each resource, containing the location of the API. Can be a template URI.

children.title: mediaType
children.description: The default media type to use for request and response bodies (payloads), e.g. "application/json"

children.title: protocols
children.description: The protocols supported by the API

children.title: version
children.description: The version of the API, e.g. 'v1'

children.title: securedBy
children.description: The security schemes that apply to every resource and method in the API

children.title: title
children.description: Short plain-text label for the API

children.title: description
children.description: A longer, human-friendly description of the API
